about_the_game:
Paratives
In Paratives, you will be able to play as paranormal detective, solving mysteries and riddles that involve ghosts, demons, and other supernatural occurrences. One player will have the ability to play as a ghost, able to possess objects and haunt their friends as they try to solve the mystery. It's up to the other players to use their detective skills to gather clues and evidence, and use their wit to decipher the clues and solve the riddles, all while trying to survive the supernatural scares and pranks of the ghost player. Whether you're playing solo or with friends, Paratives offers a thrilling and immersive experience that will test your skills and keep you on the edge of your seat.

Maps
In Paratives, players can choose from a variety of maps to play on. The maps range in size, and are suitable for solo play or for parties of up to 4 players. The maps are commonly set in houses, but there are also a few separate maps set in public or special buildings. This ensures that players will always have the perfect map for their party size, no matter how many people they're playing with. The maps in Paratives are carefully designed to provide a variety of locations and settings, adding to the immersion and excitement of the gameplay experience. Whether you're investigating a creepy old mansion or a place in nature, Paratives has a map to suit your needs.

Play as ghost!
In Paratives, players have the option to switch sides and play as a ghost. As the ghost, you'll have the ability to possess objects and haunt the other players, who are playing as paranormal detectives. You can cast paranormal events and hunt down the detectives, trying to scare them and hinder their progress as they solve the mystery. If you're playing in a party with friends, one player can be the ghost while the others are detectives. The ghost player can work against the detectives, trying to outsmart them and thwart their efforts to solve the case. With the option to play as both a detective and a ghost, Paratives offers a unique and exciting gameplay experience that can be enjoyed with friends.

Ingame Voice Chat
In Paratives, players can communicate with each other through the in-game voice chat feature. This allows for a more immersive and interactive experience, as players can strategize and solve mysteries together in real time. The voice chat feature can also lead to some hilarious and unexpected moments, as players can play off each other's reactions and responses. And in the midst of all the paranormal investigation and riddle-solving, the voice chat can also add to the horror factor, as players can hear each other's reactions to the ghostly encounters and supernatural scares that they encounter. Overall, the in-game voice chat feature in Paratives adds an extra layer of excitement and immersion to the gameplay experience.
